attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tibet was invaded in the 1950's by China against her will.

Great Britain has a proud heritage of protecting countries who have experienced such acts of terror. 

We suggest we withdraw from the Olympics in August 2008 and urge all our allies to follow our example.

Tibet is a peaceful nation please let us help it stay this way and return it to the Tibetan people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
